explanations.C: I think you might have counted the number of decimal places in the question and that's a good start. But when we do 8 x 15 = 120, we need to put 120 into those 3 decimal places.
explanations.D: 8 × 15 = 120. Looking at the question, 0.8 has 1 decimal place and 0.15 has 2 decimal places, so we have a total of 3 decimal places. So we need to put 120 into the 3 decimal places, so it is 0.120, which can be written as 0.12.
